comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: I wonder if this picture has something to do with the official opening of Wombeyan Caves Road (originally called Duprez Road) by the Minister for Public Works in January 1900. There is also a tunnel - [http://www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2937577694/] Vivid description of how the road was named and the journey of the Ministerial party here - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/14292766 . Amazingly, Google street view covers this road, but I have not yet been able to discover this location or the tunnel. The road surface and width is only marginally better today!
